duties_responsibilities.duty: Develop technical strategies and lead new product programs
Lead and supervise a team of engineers for product design and development
Recruit, hire, and develop R&D staff
Collaborate with cross-functional leaders and Olympus R&D Centers
Participate in project meetings and resolve issues to maintain R&D staff engagement
Coordinate with project managers and partner with marketing for new product ideas and sustain engineering support
Review and ensure project compliance with regulatory requirements
Interface with supplier design partners and external partners
Assist in establishing and maintaining department budgets
Responsible for recruitment, performance, and development of staff
Perform all other essential duties as directed

education_certification.credential: B.S. in Engineering (mechanical or biomedical preferred) or equivalent experience and technical education
